# Bertrand Brands
> Brand, web, and systems studio based in Greater Sudbury, Ontario, Canada.

## About
Bertrand Brands is a brand, web, and systems design studio led by Scott Bertrand. Based in Greater Sudbury, Ontario, the studio serves businesses across Northern Ontario and Canada. The studio specializes in clear, structured brand and web work — helping businesses that value clarity over complexity.

## Services

### Focus Studio (Fixed-scope work with clear timelines and public pricing)
- **Starter Site** — $750 CAD, delivered in 1 business day. A fast-launch website built for speed and simplicity.
- **One-Page Redesign** — $1,250 CAD, delivered in 2–3 business days. A fully custom, code-based single-page website. No templates, no builders.
- **Brandmark & Visual Identity** — $950 CAD, delivered in 5–7 business days. Primary brandmark with supporting marks and visual direction.

### Exploratory Sessions (Entry layer for new clients)
- **Introductory Direction Call** — Free, ~20 minutes. Live video call for fit and high-level direction.
- **Brand or Website Clarity Session** — $145 CAD, ~45 minutes. Working session with diagnosis and next steps.

### Core Services (Strategic, discovery-led engagements)
- Strategic Brand Review
- Digital Platform Build
- Brand Reset
- Full Brand + Platform Reset
- Brand Moments & Micro-Activations (by request only)

Core Services use private pricing and require a discovery process to begin.
